name: Shooting Good
description:
Shooting-Good is a First person shooter. You will be able to play through 4 maps, although, only 2 of them are finished. 

Expect some bugs and inconveniences since its not finished. 

I've used multiple assets from the Unreal Marketplace to speed up the process. 

CREDITS:

Myself

Music: Joth, Nicole Marie T, Juhani Junkala (https://www.youtube.com/@subspaceaudio6850)

[CONTROLS]

T: Grapple hook, its not finished.

Shift: crouch

Middle mouse button: Slow down time

left mouse button: Aim
